io.micronaut.context.scope

Interface CustomScopeRegistry

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultCustomScopeRegistry

    public interface CustomScopeRegistry
    An interface for a registry of CustomScope instances.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
